text: I love glamour and artificial beauty. I love the idea of artifice and dressing up and makeup and hair.
author: Dita Von Teese

text: My beauty icons are women whose images are self-created.
author: Dita Von Teese

text: I really believe that beauty comes from health - sensible eating and exercise.
author: Dita Von Teese

text: I do not see any beauty in self-restraint.
author: Mary MacLane

text: Beauty and the Beast seemed like it all was really brown. The whole thing was just so brown and orange and yellow, like Burger King or something. I don't think I would have liked Beauty and the Beast at any age.
author: Mike Judge
